title: Employee Evaluation App
description: A professional, clean, and functional employee evaluation app that accepts a CSV file containing time sheet data and returns a comprehensive evaluation report

pages.name: Home
pages.purpose: Upload CSV file and view dashboard

pages.name: Data Table
pages.purpose: View detailed data for each employee

pages.name: Chart
pages.purpose: View calculated metrics in a visual format

pages.name: Report
pages.purpose: View generated evaluation report for each employee

state: Generated evaluation report for each employee
interactions: View uploaded data in dashboard and data table
Navigate to different sections of the app using navigation bar
View calculated metrics in chart component
Generate and view comprehensive evaluation report for each employee
acceptance_criteria: App accepts a CSV file containing time sheet data
App displays a clear and concise dashboard with overview of uploaded data
App displays detailed data for each employee in data table
App displays calculated metrics in a visual format using charts
App generates a comprehensive evaluation report for each employee
App is responsive and adapts to different screen sizes and devices
App incorporates accessibility features, including high contrast mode and compatibility with screen readers
